thread.title: Brave Emirati soldier martyred in Yemen
thread.title_full: Brave Emirati soldier martyred in Yemen

title: Brave Emirati soldier martyred in Yemen

organizations.name: general command of the armed forces

text:
Brave Emirati soldier martyred in Yemen Web Team, Ahmed Shaaban /Dubai Filed on February 24, 2017 | Last updated on February 24, 2017 at 03.40 pm Share 
(Supplied photo) He was based in Dubai's Al Warqa area. An Emirati soldier was martyred while in the line of duty, the General Command of the Armed Forces announced on Friday. Sergeant Khalid Al Balochi, one of the UAE's skilled and brave servicemen died while taking part in the 'Operation Restoring Hope' as part of the Arab coalition campaign led by Saudi Arabia against Houthi rebels in Yemen. #????_???
